[color=violet]About the book from the Author:-[/color]

[color=red]Paperback: 68 pages
Publisher: CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform; 1 edition (July 20, 2014)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1500582204
ISBN-13: 978-1500582203[/color]

[color=lime]A ruthless and a bastard prince inherits the throne in his early age from his magnanimous father, King Ademeus, who had fought to inherit the kingdom and build it to be the most powerful of the five kingdoms. But after a sudden death, the prince was immediately crowned king, and he became known as a man who rules with an iron fist, and with a cruel heart. Although King Letum was feared throughout the five kingdoms, he isolated himself because he could not trust anyone, and with the prophecy that his child would challenge his existence on the throne, the king tried to abstain from having any children. But with untrustworthy allies and a drunken night, his worst fear came to past.[/color]
